alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Morton; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 7:05PM CDT until September 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Morton County in south central North Dakota... Western Oliver County in south central North Dakota... South central Mercer County in south central North Dakota... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 703 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northeast of Hebron, or 18 miles south of Beulah, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...At 700 PM CDT trained weather spotters reported quarter size hail and wind gusts as high as 70 mph 7 miles north of Glen Ullin in Morton County. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hannover around 735 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
